parameter.name: config_37
parameter.label: 37: Siren Sound
parameter.description: 1,The value1 (low byte) is used to select the Siren sound</br> Value1=0,do not change the current Siren sound.</br> Value1=1,Siren sound1 is selected.</br> Value1=2,Siren sound2 is selected.</br> Value1=3,Siren sound3 is selected.</br> Value1=4,Siren sound4 is selected.</br> Value1=5,Siren sound5 is selected.</br> Other values will be ignored.</br> 2,The value 2(high byte)is used to adjust the volume:</br> Value2=0,do not change the current volume.</br> Value2=1,set the volume to 88dB.</br> Value2=2,set the volume to 100dB.</br> Value2=3,set the volume to 105dB.</br> Othervalueswillbeignored.

parameter.name: config_80
parameter.label: 80: Enable Notifications
parameter.description: Enable to send notifications to associated devices (Group1) when the state of Siren changed (0=nothing,1=hailCC,2=basic CC report).
